sentences.sentence: Three cheetahs tuck in just after running down a pregnant springbok on a cold winter's morning.
sentences.translation: 在一个寒冷的早上，三头猎豹在撞到一只怀孕的跳羚后，就狼吞虎咽地吃了起来。

sentences.sentence: They afford an opportunity for people from all backgrounds to encounter a range of animals from drone bees to springbok or salmon to better understand the natural world we live in.
sentences.translation: 它们为来自不同背景的人们提供了一个机会，让他们接触到从雄蜂到跳羚、鲑鱼等多种动物，从而更好地了解我们生活的自然世界。

sentences.sentence: See robben island (robben-island.org.za), then take a bus (intercape.co.za) to Springbok.
sentences.translation: 可看罗宾岛(robben-island.org.za)，然后坐巴士(intercape . co . za)去斯普林·博克。
